name: programming-techniques-guide
description: Comprehensive guide to programming techniques and algorithms for competitive programming

scripts.build: npm run build:mkdocs && npm run copy:files && npm run build:sw
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.setup: npm run install:python && npm run install:firebase
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting markdown files...' && find docs -name '*.md' -exec echo 'Checking {}' \;
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  build     - Build MkDocs, copy files, and generate service worker' && echo '  build:mkdocs - Build MkDocs site only' && echo '  copy:files - Copy manifest.json and offline.html to site' && echo '  build:sw  - Generate service worker only' && echo '  serve     - Start development server' && echo '  deploy    - Build and deploy to Firebase' && echo '  dev       - Start dev server on all interfaces' && echo '  clean     - Remove build directory' && echo '  preview   - Preview Firebase deployment' && echo '  setup     - Install Python and Firebase dependencies'
